comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Albert_P._Niblack Note that the caption on the photo has been amended. He held the rank of commander in this photo, and would have been a captain in 1914.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: rjones0856: thank you for the fuller form of his name. We will update the description. Other photos of Niblack are in the Harris & Ewing collection and National Photo Co. collection in the Prints and Photographs Online Catalog, for example: www.loc.gov/pictures/item/hec2009005682/
